pageProduct.name: Alka-Seltzer Regular Effervescent 20 Tablets
pageProduct.description:
Information

Alka-Seltzer provides fast, effective, temporary relief of pain associated with headache, migraine headaches, toothaches, backache, arthritis, rheumatics, period pain, sore throat and the symptoms of cold and flu.

Always read the label. Do not use if you have a stomach ulcer, heart failure, are pregnant or allergic to anti-inflammatory medicines. Follow the directions for use. If symptoms persist, talk to your health professional. Incorrect use could be harmful.

Soluble effervescent tablet

Easy to dissolve in a glass of water.

Fast & effective temporary relief from headache, body aches & pains.Keep a box handy for when you need it

Pleasant tasting regular flavour

General Information

Alka-Seltzer Regular Flavoured Effervescent Tablets provide fast and temporary relief of body aches and pains, headaches.

For fast, effective temporary relief of pain associated with headache, migraine headache, toothache, backache, mild arthritis and rheumatism, period pain, sore throat and the symptoms of cold and flu.
- Fast relief
- Pleasant tasting flavour
- Soluble effervescent tablet

Boxed Contents: 20 effervescent tablets

Size: 20 Pack

Warnings

Always read the label. Do not use if you have a stomach ulcer, heart failure, are pregnant or allergic to anti-inflammatory medicines. Follow the directions for use. If symptoms persist, talk to your health professional. Incorrect use could be harmful.

CAUTION

Do not use Alka-Seltzer:- During the first 6 months of pregnancy, except on doctor's advice. Do not use at all during the last 3 months of pregnancy.- If you have a stomach ulcer or history of heart failure.- If you are allergic to aspirin or other anti-inflammatory medicines. If you get an allergic reaction, stop taking and see your doctor immediately. Unless your doctor has advised you to, do not use Alka-Seltzer:- For more than a few days at a time. Prolonged used could be harmful. - In children under 12 years of age.- In children 12 to 16 years of age with or recovering from chicken pox, influenza or fever.- If you have asthma.- With other products containing aspirin or anti-inflammatory medicines or with medicines that you are taking regularly.- For thinning the blood or for your heart. The maximum daily dose contains 5.7g of Sodium (477 mg Sodium per tablet).

Ingredients

Each tablet contains 324mg Aspirin.

Directions

Adults: Take 1-3 tablets dissolved in a glass of water every 4 hours as necessary. Do not exceed 12 tablets in 24 hours.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25°C.
